snippet: The body — not exalted, but in its weaknesses — gets focus in many significant films of 2012, including “Amour,” “The Sessions” and “Rust and Bone.”
abstract: Stephen Holden's roundup of notable movies from 2012 focuses on role vulnerable nature of body plays in each story.
lead_paragraph: The body — not exalted, but in its weaknesses — gets focus in many significant films of 2012, including “Amour,” “The Sessions” and “Rust and Bone.”

headline.seo: ‘Lincoln’ and ‘Amour’ Top Stephen Holden’s Best-Of List
headline.main: The Year of the Body Vulnerable
headline.print_headline: The Year Of the Body Vulnerable
